<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local</value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Sounds </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Causes a smooth change in the radio volume. The change duration is given by time, the target volume by volume. The default radio volume is 1.0. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> time '''fadeRadio''' volume </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> time: [[Number]] in seconds </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> volume: [[Number]] - radio volume range 0 to 1. Maximum volume is 1. Default is 1. </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>5 [[fadeRadio]] 0.1</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[fadeSound]], [[fadeMusic]], [[fadeSpeech]], [[radioVolume]], [[soundVolume]], [[musicVolume]]  </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
